ItemTooltips.ward_observer: As a support hero, buy a courier or wards.
ItemTooltips.courier: As a support hero, buy a courier or wards.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: You are a strong, powerful support who don't need no man. But Mekansm is the follow-up to your first ability.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Depending on the team line-up (if they are mostly magic casters or not), you may not need Pipe of Insight.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: If you can reach it; go for it. This item may prove to be especially useful if you find that the enemy team is split-pushing and/or a fellow player has strayed from the team.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: The extra armour should help you against physical carries who focus you specifically down. Also great to prevent fleeing foes with its AOE slow.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Depending on the enemy's line-up, Crimson Guard can be especially useful to keep fragile magic-users on your team alive for a little bit longer. Definitely an item to consider if your team needs it; however Mekansm should be enough.
ItemTooltips.crimson_guard: Get Crimson Guard towards the later part of the game where you are needed for team-fights. Omniknight can extend the feeling of his ultimate thanks to Crimson Guard; truly mitigating the amount of physical damage taken.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Soul Ring works well with Purification to keep your heroes alive and give you mana until you have Arcane Boots.
ItemTooltips.orb_of_venom: This works in combination of your passive, Degen Aura, hitting them. It is considerably good if you're playing aggressive.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: Use this when using your ultimate. You take no physical damage thus the armor reduction only really affects the target.

AbilityTooltips.omniknight_purification: This heal ability also does damage to nearby heroes, if timed correctly, you can hit two birds with one stone.
AbilityTooltips.omniknight_repel: Purification can be a great way to keep Pudge from rotting himself to death or to give a physical carry the &amp;amp;quot;Black King Bar&amp;amp;quot; effect it needs to defeat opponents.
AbilityTooltips.omniknight_guardian_angel: Guardian Angel gives physical immunity, not magical, so spells can still stun and hurt your team for a lot.
